arguments.help: This is the default help message for the command line demo Execting the example binary, with ./mybinary --help this callback is executed. Can be overwritten
arguments.shelp: Only the short Help Menu.Use '--help' for more info.

arguments.help: In case we want to create a history file in which we store all previously executed commands
Use and allow a current history when in interactive mode. Commands need to be rerunable
Use and allow a historyfile for multiple executions of the shell, Commands can be reentered etc..
Run the shell or the entire program in verbose mode. If a number is provided, different verbosities will be used. Can be overwritten.
Specifies a configuration file, from which commands will be parsed, can only be executed on booting the application
